ApproxsimClient.timeline
Interface ActivityAdapterListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
Timeline
public interface ActivityAdapterListener
extends EventListener

ActivityAdapterListener's listens to changes in ActivityAdapters.

Method Summary
 void activityAdapterRemoved(ActivityAdapter activity_adapter)
          Signaled when an ActivityAdapters activity is removed.
 void activityAdapterSelected(ActivityAdapter activity_adapter, boolean selected)
          Signaled when an ActivityAdapters activity is selected.
 void activityAdapterUpdated(ActivityAdapter activity_adapter)
          Signaled when displaylists in an ActivityAdapter needs to be updated.
 

Method Detail

activityAdapterRemoved

void activityAdapterRemoved(ActivityAdapter activity_adapter)
Signaled when an ActivityAdapters activity is removed.

Parameters:
activity_adapter - the ActivityAdapter whose activity is being removed.

activityAdapterUpdated

void activityAdapterUpdated(ActivityAdapter activity_adapter)
Signaled when displaylists in an ActivityAdapter needs to be updated.

Parameters:
activity_adapter - the ActivityAdapter that needs to be updated.

activityAdapterSelected

void activityAdapterSelected(ActivityAdapter activity_adapter,
                             boolean selected)
Signaled when an ActivityAdapters activity is selected.

Parameters:
activity_adapter - the ActivityAdapter that needs to be updated.
selected - indicates if the activity is selected or unselected.
